name: BalloonPop
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: balloon pop
des:
NEW AND EXCLUSIVE TO ECHO SHOW DEVICES!

Sharpen your memory and test your reflexes with a collection of family-friendly, touch-based mini-games exclusive to Echo Show devices!

MINI-GAMES INCLUDED
• Word Hunt - Tap balloons to hunt for the letters you'll need to spell as many words as you can before time runs out!
• Color Chaos - Only pop balloons matching the color you're given. Don't let them escape. And stay sharp because the color changes!
• Memory Match - A high-flying twist on the classic matching game where you burst balloons to find pairs of matching items as quickly as possible.
• Sequence - Remember the musical pattern and repeat it by pressing the colored balloons in the right order. Get it right and the sequence gets longer. One mistake and the game is over!
• And more coming soon!

Get the all-access pass and you can play any mini-game anytime, and you'll get access to new games whenever they're added.

Without the pass, you can enjoy two different games every day as much as you want, so check back often to see what's available!

Balloon Pop is only supported on the Echo Show 10, Echo Show 8 and Echo Show 5.

FEEDBACK
Ideas? Issues? Questions? If you'd like to leave feedback or get in touch, please leave us an e-mail at whoa.labs.for.alexa@gmail.com. We love to hear from you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
